p.s: Provides drivers to access the native XML database eXist
p.d: XML_DB_eXist provides an OO-interface for easily retrieving and modifying data with PHP5 in an eXist database. eXist is an Open Source native XML database featuring efficient, index-based XQuery processing, automatic indexing, extensions for full-text search, XUpdate support and tight integration with existing XML development tools. The package uses SOAP, XML-RPC or REST to communicate with eXist.
